message.title: Side Job: Fertilizer Delivery
message.content:
If you own a front loader with pallet fork, you can transport these pallets with fertilizer to the marked spot behind the supermarket.
For each delivered pallet you receive a small payment, and your reputation grows.

message.title: Side Job: Return Bottles
message.content: There are 100 bottles scattered across the island. If you return these to a bottle bank, you receive a small amount of money, and your reputation increases.

message.title: Farm Machines Trader
message.content: Here you can buy and sell farm machines and implements. Enter the spot in front of the entrance to see the available product range.

message.title: Welcome to Your Farm!
message.content:
An unexpected inheritance has made you the proud owner of a farm along with a few vehicles and tools.
Do you have what it takes to be a successful farmer?

message.title: Humble Beginnings
message.content: When you start out your farm largely consists of old and rickety vehicles. Once you've earned enough money you should visit the trader and buy better machines.

message.title: CONGRATULATIONS!
message.content:
You've reached the maximum reputation of 100%!
The farm machines trader now pays you 85% of the buying price when you sell something.

message.title: Maximum Reached!
message.content: Your reputation is already at the maximum.
